syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Links between macroeconomic problems and their interrelatedness

learning_objectives.description: relationship between the internal value of money and the external value of money
relationship between the balance of payments and inflation
relationship between growth and the balance of payments
relationship between inflation and unemployment: traditional Phillips curve, expectations-augmented Phillips curve (short- and long-run Phillips curve)
